html:
Nov 11 - Bids for AMP Capital and 3i Infrastructure's Danish offshore energy services vessel operator Esvagt are due in mid-December with infra investors such as CKI, First Sentier and Partners Group said to be bidding. 3i Infrastructure values its 50% stake at £189m and the company has €376m in debt. The sellers are hoping for a sale around the €1bn mark.

(Reporting by Rod Morrison)

((rod.morrison@refintiv.com; +44 204 503 3058))
